events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and want to request a refund because it is not what I paid for.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under 'Refund' as the customer requested money back due to an incorrect item delivered.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding the wrong product shipment.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect product you received. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 457892 and I have attached pictures showing the wrong item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the incorrect product.
Thanks for your quick response and for offering the return label. I appreciate the prompt handling of my refund.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5 business days.
We’re following up to ensure your refund was received and to check if you need any further assistance from our side.
As your refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we have now closed this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
